settings.heading: Dog Treats With a Purpose
settings.text:
At Table & Twine, we believe every pet deserves a loving home—and a few treats, too. That’s why we’ll be giving 100% of the profits from our house-made dog treats to the Humane Society of Raleigh.

Like Table & Twine, the Humane Society of Charlotte believes in our local communities. Since 1978, the Humane Society of Charlotte has upheld its mission of creating new, loving families while building a world where there are no more homeless or unwanted animals. We’re excited to partner with this long-standing pillar of our community and support Charlotte's furry friends, both in your home & at the Humane Society of Charlotte.
settings.box_text: Learn more about how the Humane Society of Charlotte supports pets & their owners.

settings.heading: Browse the range
settings.text: Add a bag (or two!) of our fresh-baked dog treats to your order today.
